555 22 States do not want to send their SNAP data to the Trump Administration to verify immigration status.

21 of the 22 have Democrat Governors. posted 6 days ago by ALT26 24 comments award share report block C3 @C_3C_3 • 6d 22 States do not want to send their SNAP data to the Trump Administration to verify immigration status. 21 of the 22 have Democrat Governors. Now why do you think they are resisting? Because the fraud in the SNAP data is staggering. Illegals are getting it. Millions of them.
